availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isabella C. Caldwell (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to John F. Caldwell in Todd County, Kentucky, on April 28, 1834. Mother of John W. Caldwell, Mollie Caldwell, and Olivia Caldwell. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 18.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow District, p. 21.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Todd County Marriages, Film #000367186, p. 96-97.
